Question.Subject: Can someone still find my search history after I've deleted it?
Question.Content: I'm giving away the old family computer to a friend. I was wanting to know if, after I've deleted the history from Internet Options or Properties can anyone see what our family has looked up?
Question.ChosenAnswer: If your giving a computer away or selling it, your best bet is to reinstall the OS, this will ensure that everything that has been done on the PC is wiped clean....

Answer.Content: If your giving a computer away or selling it, your best bet is to reinstall the OS, this will ensure that everything that has been done on the PC is wiped clean....
